ideas.questionnaires: Creation of Questionnaires and Interview Guidelines

problems.contract_review: Contract review - liability & insurance including checklist
problems.documentation: Documentation/administration and summarization of email threads, documents, contract reviews in file system with description creation
problems.legal_documents: Creation of legal documents, claims, claim responses, letters etc.
problems.questionnaires: Creation of questionnaires and interview guidelines
problems.contract_templates: Creation of contract templates, policy templates, privacy notices and other documents
problems.standards_analysis: Review and analysis of standards (NDA, CoC, IT T&Cs, DPA etc.) and non-standardized contracts

solutions.damage_assessment: Is the damage eligible for compensation? Liability requirements met? Assessment of damage extent
solutions.contract_review: Creation of checklist including marking relevant passages, preliminary review, translation
solutions.documentation: Possibly automated assignment of documents to relevant files and content extraction with summary creation
solutions.legal_documents: Use of research results, case summaries etc. for creating texts in legal tone using predefined templates
solutions.questionnaires: Processing and drafting questions after situation briefing
solutions.contract_templates: Text creation based on bullet points and topic blocks, creating and inserting into given templates
solutions.standards_analysis: Automatic review and summary considering predefined rules (OTRIS AI solution)

complexity.damage_assessment: Contract review, legal liability, market values, scrap values, goods type and function
complexity.contract_review: Data for checklist can be easily extracted. Only insurance topics relevant, not entire contract. Insurance coverage provision possible.
complexity.documentation: No high complexity because: pure extraction of existing data; some systems known that can already implement this
complexity.legal_documents: Contract creation: more complex; Creation of legal documents and processing descriptions: less complex
complexity.standards_analysis: Medium to high: Depends on rule variety and document structure. AI must understand and apply both legal language and specific company rules.
complexity.routine_cases: Medium: Building internal knowledge pool, training AI on company-specific content and ongoing maintenance needed. Technically well implementable with existing solutions.

cost.damage_assessment: Separate program needed (contains confidential company data). Relatively low staff effort (reduction in workload). Cost savings insurance & expert costs
cost.contract_review: Separate program needed (contains confidential company data). Relatively low staff effort (reduction in workload).
cost.legal_documents: Medium to high investment costs; ongoing costs dependent on usage and API queries
cost.standards_analysis: Costs through OTRIS (Add-On with OTRIS) relatively low since system already exists and it's just an add-on
cost.routine_cases: One-time implementation and continuous maintenance by Legal (DUV GPT could be used after implementation)

risk.damage_assessment: Must be double-checked by employee. Negotiations still possible. Partially contains sensitive company data
risk.contract_review: Must be double-checked by employee to avoid coverage gaps.
risk.documentation: Medium risk as only existing content is extracted and no new results are generated
risk.legal_documents: Medium: Risks concern content accuracy, data confidentiality in external processing and copyright. Well manageable through clear governance and manual final check
risk.standards_analysis: Low to medium: Low risk for internal use; for external cloud solution, review of data protection and security required. Risk of incorrect assessments with incomplete rules.

strategic.damage_assessment: Savings in external and internal personnel expenses
strategic.contract_review: Faster customer feedback = improved customer satisfaction. Savings in employee effort
strategic.legal_documents: Automation, time savings, standardization and uniformity, acceleration
strategic.standards_analysis: Very good fit: Strengthens quality assurance, standardization and traceability. Supports digital transformation of legal department and promotes consistency.
strategic.routine_cases: Direct response, quick initial assessment, process acceleration
